data: Richard Ballinger Seaton | Richard Ballinger Seaton the fourteen hundred and seventy-first

“Mother-r-r!” A sturdy, auburn-haired urchin of twelve—Richard Ballinger Seaton the fourteen hundred and seventy-first—turned to the queenly young matron who was his mother as the viewing area before them went blank.
